name: Yool
description: Towards the end of the year, the plump and pleasant Yool schedules a relaxing sojourn on Cold Island. Its arrival is heralded by the jingle bells dangling from its antlers, and the booming resonance of its voice. Just being near a Yool produces feelings of peace and joy, so the other Monsters always try and convince it to stay the whole year round.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 12 hr, Enhanced Time: 1 day 3 hr
